title: Joou Heika no Petite Angie (Angie Girl)
synopsis: 19th century London. Angie is a 12-year-old girl, descended from nobility. She once helped to solve the Queenâ€™s jewel robbery case and since then, the Queen has appointed her to work on particularly difficult cases. Her brilliance and courage overwhelm many grownups. She is assisted by other children and Detective Michael of Scotland Yard.
